project.description: installs the latest build rhq master branch

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "===========================================================" echo START, ADD ALL PLUGINS echo "===========================================================" rm -Rf /home/hudson/rhq-plugins/auto/* find /home/hudson/.hudson/jobs/build_master/workspace/modules/plugins -name "*SNAPSHOT.jar" -exec cp {} /home/hudson/rhq-plugins/auto/ \; #find -L /home/hudson/.hudson/jobs/build_master/lastSuccessful -name "*SNAPSHOT.jar" -exec cp {} /home/hudson/rhq-plugins/auto/ \; /home/hudson/remote-rhq-load-plugins.sh auto-rhq.usersys.redhat.com echo "===========================================================" echo END, ADD ALL PLUGINS echo "==========================================================="
echo "===========================================================" echo START INSTALL echo "===========================================================" rm -Rf * #git clone git://github.com/weissjeffm/webui-framework.git #git clone git://git.rhndev.redhat.com/automatjon #chmod 600 $WORKSPACE/automatjon/jon-2.0/.ssh/id* /home/hudson/remote-rhq-install.sh auto-rhq.usersys.redhat.com echo "===========================================================" echo END INSTALL echo "==========================================================="
#/home/hudson/remote-rhq-load-plugins-after.sh auto-rhq.usersys.redhat.com
